import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, Outlet, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; function Sucess() { const location = useLocation(); const cost = location.state.totalcost; const count = location.state.counts; const theater = location.state.theatre; const time = location.state.time; const date = location.state.date; const name = location.state.name; const title = location.state.title; const app = location.state.payoption; const photo = location.state.photo; const mail = location.state.mail; const city = location.state.city; const number = location.state.number; useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); const getRan= size => [...Array(size)].map(()=> Math.floor(Math.random()*16).toString(16)).join(''); const num=getRan(6); return ( <>

{name} , Your Tickets are successfully booked

Payment through:

{app}

Mobile Number:

{number}

Booking id:

#{num}

Movie Name :

{title}

No.of Tickets :

{count}

Total Cost :

{cost}/-

Theatre :

{theater}

Date :

{date}

Show Time :

{time}

); } export default Sucess;
